fullText: Is it not passing strange, that the only way allowed for wokeness to end, has to include shipping innocents with a misinterpreted tattoo off to a foreign torture center?  Why are things only allowed to get strictly, strictly worse?

After 2+ great years, I‚Äôm leaving Scale AI to pursue other opportunities and spend more time on this website.

Big thanks to @alexandr_wang and all the talented people at Scale I had the pleasure of working with ‚Äî it‚Äôs been a blast!
